result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Milwaukee County Clerk of Circuit Court

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Michael Alphonse Kneepkens

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Michael Alphonse Kneepkens in court with attorney Matthew Adrian Lamke.  Defendant Michael Alphonse Kneepkens in custody.  Kelly O'Neill appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Pursuant to plea negotiations and on motion of the State, Court ordered case dismissed and read-in to case 2015CM2354 for the purposes of sentencing.

Attorney Matthew Adrian Lamke in court, defendant Michael Alphonse Kneepkens not in court, in custody.  Jennifer L Pickett appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Case in court for plea hearing, defense requests a jury trial date.  Case remains calendared in Branch 47.  Jury trial scheduled for October 10, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Matthew Adrian Lamke in court, defendant Michael Alphonse Kneepkens not in court, in custody.  Katherine M Halopka-Ivery appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: sm
Case in court for plea and sentencing hearing, however defense requests more time.  Case remains calendared in Branch 47.  Plea hearing scheduled for August 8, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Matthew Adrian Lamke in court, defendant Michael Alphonse Kneepkens not in court, in custody.  Katherine M Halopka-Ivery appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk:  vk  Defense is not prepared to proceed with the plea and sentencing this morning.  Matter adjourned to 1:30 pm same day.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for June 1, 2016 at 01:30 pm.

Attorney Matthew Adrian Lamke in court, defendant Michael Alphonse Kneepkens not in court, in custody in another county.  Sarah Zwach appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Due to defendant's pending cases   Court ordered case adjourned for status conference in Branch 47.  Status conference scheduled for June 1, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Matthew Adrian Lamke in court, defendant Michael Alphonse Kneepkens not in court, in custody.  Kelly O'Neill appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court ordered case adjourned for status conference in Branch 47  Status conference scheduled for April 4, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Michael Alphonse Kneepkens not in court, defendant in custody.  Kelly O'Neill appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty Lamke out ill today.  Court ordered case adjourned for status conference in Branch 47  Status conference scheduled for February 19, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Matthew Adrian Lamke in court, defendant Michael Alphonse Kneepkens not in court, in custody.  Alyssa M. Schaller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court ordered case adjourned for status conference in Branch 47  Status conference scheduled for February 16, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Matthew Adrian Lamke in court, defendant Michael Alphonse Kneepkens not in court, in custody.  Alyssa M. Schaller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court ordered case adjourned for status conference in Branch 47  Status conference scheduled for December 17, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Matthew Adrian Lamke in court, defendant Michael Alphonse Kneepkens not in court, in custody.  James C. Griffin appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea in Branch 47  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for December 1, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Michael Alphonse Kneepkens in court with attorney Brian Christopher Hagner.  Defendant Michael Alphonse Kneepkens in custody.  
Sarra Mae Kiaie appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Deputy Court Clerk:  sm

Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Siefert, Branch 47.  
Scheduling conference scheduled for October 16, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Initial Appearance on Monday, October 5, 2015 at 8:30 AM in In custody Intake, CJF Rm 137A of the Circuit Court of Milwaukee County.
Notice of bond forfeiture mailed to defendant; Original in file. ($150.00 signature bond) ad
Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a Bench Warrant to be issued.  COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE BENCH  WARRANT. lr

Defendant Michael Alphonse Kneepkens not in court.  Katherine Halopka-Ivery appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a Bench Warrant to be issued.  COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE BENCH  WARRANT. lr

Defendant Michael Alphonse Kneepkens in court.  Patrick J Anderson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Defendant is advised that this case is assigned to Judge Siefert, Branch 47. Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.   Defendant received a copy of the complaint and was advised of right to counsel.   Defendant does not qualify for Public Defender representation.  Court entered a plea of not guilty on behalf of the Defendant. Court reserves Defendant's right to file a substitution of judge pursuant to Sec. 971.20 until Defendant's next scheduled court appearance.  Case is adjourned for a Pretrial Conference in Branch 47.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for May 21, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Defendant is Out-of-Custody. Court appearance in Out-Of-Custody Court, Room 221 Safety Building on 4/15/15 @ 1:30 pm
